SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppUser
Represents a user in the application with authentication credentials.
BaseActivity
BaseActivity class provides a common behavior for all activities in the application..
BaseActivityTest
Base UI test class.
BaseDatabaseService
the FirebaseAuthenticationServices singleton class includes methods for handling user authentication via Firebase Authentication.
BaseMoodListFragment
BaseMoodListFragment is an abstract fragment that displays a list of moods and an optional map view for visualizing mood locations.
BaseUserListFragment
A base fragment for displaying a list of users with search functionality.
BatchLoader
The BatchLoader class holds the processing of Firestore collections into batches.
Comment
The Comment class represents a type of post that users can leave on a (usually different) user's Mood post.
CommentListAdapter
A custom ArrayAdapter for displaying Comment objects in a ListView.
CommentListFragment
A DialogFragment that displays and manages comments for a specific mood event.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterInstrumentedTest
 
FirebaseAuthenticationService
the FirebaseAuthenticationServices singleton class includes methods for handling user authentication via Firebase Authentication.
FollowersFragment
It displays a list of followers and provides functionality to remove them.
FollowingFragment
A fragment that displays a list of users the current user is following, with functionality to unfollow them.
FollowRelationshipEnum
Enumeration for the states of a users following relation to another user.
HintDropdownAdapter
This class implements a custom array adapter that disables and grays out the first item of a dropdown in order for it to be a hint.
HintDropdownEnumInterface
Interface for enumerations that provide a display name for dropdown menus.
HintDropdownItemSelectedListener
A custom listener for handling item selections in dropdown (Spinner) menus.
ImageUtils
Utility class for image-related operations.
LocationPermissionManager
The LocationPermissionManager utility class manages the users location permission on Mood posts.
LocationPermissionManager.PermissionGrantedCallback
Callback interface for handling if permission is granted.
LoginFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for login.
LoginSignupActivity
Handles user authentication flow by managing the login and signup fragments.
LoginSignupActivityTest
UI tests for all login and signup related actions
LoginSignupFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for LoginSignup screen.
LoginSignupFragment.onButtonClickListener
 
MainActivity
The main activity that serves as the entry point for the application after login.
MapsUtils
The MapsUtils class is a utility class for managing Moods locations.
MentionedMoodsFragment
The MentionedMoodsFragment class extends the BaseMoodListFragment but shows the list of Moods where the user is mentioned in.
Mood
The Mood class is the base class for all Mood posts the user can make.
MoodAnger
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of anger.
MoodConfusion
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of confusion.
MoodDatabaseService
the MoodDatabaseService singleton class includes methods for making queries on the "moods" collection in the firestore database.
MoodDatabaseServiceUnitTest
Class for testing MoodDatabaseService
MoodDisgust
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of disgust.
MoodEmotionEnum
Enumeration that represents possible emotions a Mood post can have.
MoodFear
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of fear.
MoodFilterFragment
A dialog fragment for filtering mood events by time, emotion, trigger text, and location.
MoodFilterState
Represents the state of filters applied to a MoodList.
MoodFilterUnitTest
class for testing MoodHistoryFragment and the filtering functions
MoodFollowingFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
MoodFormFragment
A DialogFragment subclass that implements form for adding and editing moods Use the MoodFormFragment.newInstance(com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.Mood) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.
MoodHappiness
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of happiness.
MoodHistoryFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for user mood history screen.
MoodInstrumentedTest
 
MoodListAdapter
MoodListAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter used to display a list of Mood objects in a ListView.
MoodSadness
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of sadness.
MoodShame
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of shame.
MoodSocialSituationEnum
Enum that represents the social situations a Mood post can have.
MoodSurprise
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of surprise.
MoodUnitTest
Class for testing Mood class and its subclasses
MyApp
 
PeopleFragment
A fragment that displays a list of people in the application.
PlacesUtils
Utility class for retrieving location data and converting to addresses for the location part of Mood posts.
PublicUser
The PublicUser class includes methods and values that represent a public Moodster user.
RequestListAdapter
Adapter class for managing a list of follow requests.
RequestsFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
SignupFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for signup.
UserButtonActionEnum
Enumeration representing the actions the user can perform on another user.
UserDatabaseService
the UserDatabaseService singleton class includes methods for making queries on the "users" collection in the firestore database.
UserDatabaseServiceUnitTest
Class for testing UserDatabaseService
UserFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
UserInstrumentedTest
 
UserListAdapter
Adapter class for displaying a list of users with an associated action button.
UserPagerAdapter
Adapter class for managing fragments in the ViewPager2 component.
ViewProfileFragment
A DialogFragment that displays the user's profile with their name, username, follower count, following count, and most recent mood emoji.
